scripts.vue-personal-page: cd apps/vue-personal-page && npm run setup && cd ../..
scripts.webjack: cd apps/webjack && npm i && npm run build && git checkout . && cd ../..
scripts.setup-apps: npm run vue-personal-page && npm run webjack
scripts.setup: npm i && git submodule update -i && npm run setup-apps && git checkout .
scripts.d-stop: docker stop personal-server && docker rm personal-server
